title: An exact historie of the late revolutions in Naples, and of their monstrous successes not to be parallel'd by any ancient or modern history / published by the Lord Alexander Giraffi in Italian ; and (for the rarenesse of the subject) rendred to English, by J.H., Esqr.
author: Giraffi, Alessandro.
publisher: Printed by R.A. for R. Lowndes,
notes: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
